titleStmt.title: A letter of dangerous consequence, from Sergeant Major Ogle, to Sir Nicholas Crisp at Oxford. As it was intercepted by Colonell Goodwin of the Parliaments forces. Together with the examination of the messenger, in the coller of whose doublet the said letter was found. Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that this letter and examination be forthwith printed and published: H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Ogle, Thomas, Sir, d. 1671.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: The letter is signed: Theophilus Philobritanis [pseud.].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
